results.name: Magnesium Glycinate
results.narrative: Magnesium glycinate became the #1 supplement trend driven by sleep/wellness TikTok, going from niche biohacker supplement to mainstream demand.

results.name: Creatine (Women's / Gummies)
results.narrative: Creatine broke out of the bodybuilding niche into mainstream women's fitness, with gummies as the format innovation driving accessibility.

results.name: Collagen Peptides
results.narrative: Collagen peptides moved from niche supplement to mainstream beauty-from-within trend, driven by science papers and influencer adoption.

results.name: Mushroom Coffee
results.narrative: Mushroom coffee (Ryze, MUD\WTR, Four Sigmatic) exploded as the healthy coffee alternative, driven by wellness TikTok and nootropic communities.

results.name: Neck Fan (Portable Cooling)
results.narrative: Portable neck fans became a viral summer essential, with seasonal demand spikes and cross-over from Asian markets.

results.name: Air Fryer Oven Combo
results.narrative: Air fryers evolved from single-purpose to combo ovens, maintaining dominant kitchen appliance demand year over year.

results.name: Sea Moss
results.narrative: Sea moss went from Caribbean traditional remedy to mainstream superfood supplement driven by TikTok wellness influencers.

results.name: Electrolyte Powder
results.narrative: LMNT and competitors drove electrolyte powders from sports niche to daily wellness essential, podcast-promoted.
